name: Suspicious Computer Account Name Change CVE-2021-42287
description: Detects the renaming of an existing computer account to a account name that doesn't contain a $ symbol as seen in attacks against CVE-2021-42287
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:4781 AND winlog.event_data.OldTargetUserName:*$*) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.NewTargetUserName:*$*)))`
